::GoldenEye::

She let a tear run down her cheek as she heard him say 'keep me'.
She looked at his face, lightly stroking his cheek, "that I will do. 
I won't let you go." 

She raised her head and looked around. "HELP! HE NEEDS HELP!"
She couldn't leave him.  She sat there, with his head cradled in her 
lap and her trying not to cry any more.  She was fearful for his 
survival. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Dollen::
> 
>             Pictures of Starscream, Galvatron, Jetfire and all the 
other
> Decepticons flashed through Dollen's mind.  The pictures of the 
Decepticon's
> transformed into pictures of Predacons.  Then, an image of 
BrightBlade and
> GoldenEye showed up.  Fire.....There was
> 
fire...........Predacons.........Burning........Help........Danger....
......
> ..The Crash......The crash...........Was he dead?????  He couldn't 
feel his
> physical structure.  He had to do something.........The Predacons 
needed
> him........GoldenEye needed him...........Something spoke in his 
mind, and
> he knew this.......He had to help!!!!  He was too young to die, and 
too
> important to the future.  He wanted to talk to GoldenEye, say 
something to
> her, anything.  But, nothing came out.  Then, he managed two 
words, "Keep
> me......................."
